summary: This Mod Adds my personal Favorite followers From Dragon age 2 and Dragon Age Inquisition. I did my best to make them look like their dragon age counterparts so keep that in mind when downloading
descriptionHtml:
Credits go to the following 

[url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/907295-azarkiowa/]azarkiowa[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148]apachii[/url]

I made 4 Dragon age Followers/characters that I like as listed below

Dragon age 2:
Jaesa Hawke (My champion character)
Bethany Hawke

Dragon Age Inquisition
Warden Blackwall
Varric Tethras

the Armor you seen in the Screen Shots  (accept for Varric) I have had for a while and don't remember where I got them

Bethany, Jaesa, and Blackwall start with Farmer Cloths, I did this so you can give them what ever kind of armor you want to put on them. Varric wears a set of Thieves Guild Armor

classes of followers

Varric is a Ranger
Jaesa Hawke is a Warrior 1 handed
Bethany Hawke is a Spellsword
Warden Blackwall is a Warrior 1 Handed

for the armor in the picture see below

Grey Warden

Armor http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/bronja/bronja_serykh_strazhej_dlja_skyrim_rekolor_v2/249-1-0-8445

Jaesa Hawke's Armor

http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/bronja/mage_hawke_armor_remoded_version/249-1-0-14969

all followers are found in Sleeping Giant Inn
author: Arturios
